committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks
Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to provide an exception to the requirements of the Act of August 30, 1890 (26 Stat. 391; 43 U.S.C. 945) with regard to certain lands in Riverside County, California.

summary.text: Exempts certain lands in Riverside County, California, that were conveyed by patent by the United States from the Federal reservation of rights-of- way for ditches and canals.

titles.title: A bill to provide an exception to the requirements of the Act of August 30, 1890 (26 Stat. 391; 43 U.S.C. 945) with regard to certain lands in Riverside County, California.
